Our Mango Snoozies Sleep Gummies are a blend of the finest ingredients designed to promote relaxation, calmness, and peaceful sleep. With 15mg of CBD (Cannabidiol), 10mg of CBN (Cannabinol), and 5mg of CBG (Cannabigerol), these gummies work together to offer you the sleep support you’ve been searching for.
Mango Snoozies Vegan Gummies Rest easy knowing that Mango Snoozies Sleep Gummies are vegan-friendly and crafted with natural ingredients. Enjoy the natural calming effects of CBD, CBN, and CBG, while also adhering to a vegan lifestyle.
Premium Ingredients for Better Sleep Each Mango Snoozies Sleep Gummy is packed with an effective combination of sleep-enhancing ingredients:
CBD (Cannabidiol) : Known for its calming properties, CBD helps reduce anxiety and relax the mind, allowing you to unwind and prepare for a good night’s sleep. CBN (Cannabinol) : Often referred to as the “sleep cannabinoid,” CBN is valued for its potential to help enhance the depth and quality of sleep. CBG (Cannabigerol) : Known for its anti-inflammatory properties, CBG can help alleviate discomfort, contributing to a more peaceful and comfortable night of rest. 5-HTP : A precursor to serotonin, 5-HTP can regulate mood and improve sleep quality by naturally helping the body achieve the right sleep cycle. Melatonin : Naturally signals your body to prepare for sleep, and helps synchronize your internal clock, making it easier to fall asleep and stay asleep. Perfectly Balanced Dosage Each Mango Snoozies Sleep Gummy delivers 15mg of CBD , 10mg of CBN , 5mg of CBG , 5mg of 5-HTP, and 3mg of melatonin, providing you with a balanced, effective blend to support your sleep cycle. With 15 gummies per package, you can enjoy a full month of restful sleep with just one gummy per night.
Why Choose Mango Snoozies Sleep Gummies? When it comes to improving your sleep, you want a product that is not only effective but also safe and enjoyable. Here’s why Mango Snoozies Sleep Gummies from Turquoise Mountain are your best choice:
A Delicious Mango Flavor Not only do these gummies help you sleep better, but they also taste great! The luscious mango flavor makes taking your sleep aid a treat you’ll look forward to each night.
Non-Psychoactive Effects Rest assured that our Mango Snoozies Sleep Gummies offer non-psychoactive effects. Unlike THC, which may cause unwanted psychoactive experiences, the combination of CBD , CBN , and CBG offers a gentle and relaxing sleep experience without any mind-altering effects.
Vegan and Cruelty-Free We believe in creating products that are good for both you and the planet. That’s why Mango Snoozies Vegan Gummies are made without any animal-derived ingredients. You can enjoy your nightly ritual with a clean conscience.
Easy-to-Use and Convenient Our gummies come in convenient, easy-to-dose packaging. Simply take one gummy each evening, and let the natural ingredients do the work. Perfect for those with busy schedules or anyone looking to make their nighttime routine more relaxing.
No Artificial Ingredients We pride ourselves on creating natural, high-quality products. Our Mango Snoozies Gummies are free from artificial flavors, colors, and preservatives, ensuring you’re getting the best possible product with every dose.
How to Use Mango Snoozies Sleep Gummies Taking Mango Snoozies Sleep Gummies is easy and convenient. Simply follow these steps to make the most of your nightly routine:
Take one Mango Snoozies Sleep Gummy about 30 minutes before you plan to sleep. Enjoy the soothing effects as the ingredients gently guide your body to relaxation. Allow the 15mg of CBD , 10mg of CBN , and 5mg of CBG to support your sleep cycle. Drift off to sleep peacefully, knowing that your body is in a state of natural relaxation.
